channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Contract Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Contract Management

item.title: CVE-2019-4485|2024-08-04T19:40:47.396Z -- ibm -- contract%20management
item.description: IBM Emptoris Sourcing 10.1.0 through 10.1.3, IBM Contract Management 10.1.0 through 10.1.3, and IBM Emptoris Spend Analysis 10.1.0 through 10.1.3 generates an error message that includes sensitive information that could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 164069.

item.title: CVE-2019-4484|2024-08-04T19:33:38.100Z -- ibm -- contract%20management
item.description: IBM Emptoris Sourcing 10.1.0 through 10.1.3, IBM Contract Management 10.1.0 through 10.1.3, and IBM Emptoris Spend Analysis 10.1.0 through 10.1.3 generates an error message that includes sensitive information that could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 164068.

item.title: CVE-2019-4483|2024-08-04T19:33:38.357Z -- ibm -- contract%20management
item.description: IBM Contract Management 10.1.0 through 10.1.3 and IBM Emptoris Spend Analysis 10.1.0 through 10.1.3 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 164067.
